Lawyer Sue Grey facing misconduct charge for allegedly breaching suppression order https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-sue-grey-faceing-misconduct-charge-for-allegedly-breaching-suppression-order/4UKKC6EEDFHM7HVEHKXMW4CNGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-sue-grey-faceing-misconduct-charge-for-allegedly-breaching-suppression-order/4UKKC6EEDFHM7HVEHKXMW4CNGI/ Tracy NealIt is alleged lawyer revealed the name of a child who had suppression in two interviews. Grey was representing the child's parents. Photo / Alex Burton

They say the sex was consensual.
